data.title: Data Engineer
data.tasks:
Designed and implemented innovative data solutions to support sustainability and climate-smart initiatives, including a national web portal for the USDA and predictive analytics tools for Syracuse University's sustainability goals. 
Built robust ETL pipelines, interactive BI dashboards, time series forecasting(regression), and a dynamic RAG chatbot to drive data accessibility, optimize decision-making, and streamline energy usage analysis. 
Collaborated with stakeholders and SMEs to ensure seamless integration, scalability, and enhanced user engagement.

data.title: Associate Software Developer
data.tasks:
Developed and optimized secure, scalable data pipelines, APIs, and cloud-based solutions to support data governance, privacy, and compliance in AWS, Azure, Databricks and Cloudera.
 Leveraged expertise in cloud data platforms, CI/CD pipelines, and database management to deliver secure and reliable applications. 
Contributed to 3 different products and collaborated across teams to integrate in-house security products with partner solutions, driving scalability and strategic alignment.
